Author: TheShortGerman
Text: I decided I needed to stop weighing the day I woke up and hopped on the scale and it was up like 2 lbs and I lost my shit and had a 2500 binge day when I had been doing so well keeping to 700/day.   It's better for my mental health to weigh 2x/week than weigh every day. I also have a terrible habit of binging and then weighing to trigger myself into purging it because the scale immediately goes down 5 lbs after I purge.
